title: Mocha muffins
ingredients: ['1 egg', '2 egg whites', '100ml (4 fl oz) semi skimmed milk', '1 tablespoon instant coffee', '1 tablespoon water', '1 dessertspoon vanilla extract', '200g (7 oz) plain flour', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 tablespoons caster sugar']
